title: Instructional Design Strategies for Integrating Generative AI in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Course exploring integration of generative AI tools into instructional design and pedagogy. Combining online/offline activities with ethical considerations and practical implementation

learning_goals: Learners can design a lesson content development process utilizing generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, DALL-E).
Learners can collaborate with instructors to provide guidelines for integrating generative AI into educational activities.
Learners can assess ethical issues (e.g., copyright, bias) arising from generative AI use and prepare response strategies.

resources: Access permissions for generative AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.)
Sample university lecture materials for case analysis

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
